rows.label: tlk70000004_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Heard Feltley Village's been attacked.
A similar thing happened in Estham
not so long ago.

rows.label: tlk70000004_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Thought that kind of trouble only
ever happened abroad...
World's more dangerous these days.

rows.label: tlk70000004_01_msg0003
rows.name:
But we should be safe here in the
capital, so long as the king's noble
reign continues.

rows.label: tlk70000004_01_msg0004
rows.name:
He makes sure things are nice and
peaceful and we don't get led astray,
so we can carry on living as always.
